page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF EMMA -1
page.content: Today is Wednesday and I am just scrambling out of bed. I am putting on a pair of jeans and a jumper to go down the yard with Mummy. I have just had a cup of tea and now I am trying to put my wellies on, now coat and hat. I have just taken the dog's lead off the hook on the wall. Now I have arrived at the yard and I am helping Mummy milk Buttercup, the house cow. Now I am having Rice Krispies for breakfast - just in the bathroom, washing and puting my school clothes on. I must not forget to clean my teeth! I am now at school and we are having our dictation. After that, we go swimming in Cirencester. Now we are having dinner: beefburgers,beans and chips followed by chocolate crunch with pink custard. After playtime, we have Singing Together with Mrs Talbot.
